actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed letters of offer to sell certain defense articles and services to Saudi Arabia.

summary.text: Expresses the objection of Congress to the sale to Saudi Arabia of defense articles and services as described in the statement submitted by the President on February 17, 1976 (transmittal numbered 76-25, 76-27, 76-28, 76-29, 76-30, 76-31, and 76-32).

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed letters of offer to sell certain defense articles and services to Saudi Arabia.
